channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on column of Pittville Pump Room, 23rd December
item.description:
Just saw today: someone has sprayed a bit of (predictable, obscene) graffiti on one of the columns at the front of the Pump Room. Green paint.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Approach Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lobleys Drive just before Motorway Bridge, 23rd December
item.description:
Not sure of building number think they are flats It’s on the left hand side 2 Potholes both near each other just at the start of M5 Motorway Bridge
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 blocked drains full of leaves, 23rd December
item.description:
Outside of number 3 Cowper road and the corner of number one nearly on pitman road. Not sure if there’s any more blocked in the street? Not many drains in this street hence floods when heavy rain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Benhall, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Re-cycling rubbish has been strewn along the verge next to the tip, 23rd December
item.description:
On the verge alongside the lay-by by the tip heading towards kingsditch lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole that has been filled before but has reopened up., 23rd December
item.description:
Close to edge of road below Green Acres on left hand side. Travelling down Kidnappers Lane, from Church Road. A blue cycling/pedestrian sign is opposite. Area is constantly wet from draining field next to road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kidnappers Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 23rd December
item.description:
Customer has mentioned that outsdie the neaighbours prperty there is a tree, in the tree there is a branch has split in half where ti joins the trunk of the tree and she is worried that if it splits anymore that it will fall. it is overhanging footpath and road. is worried that it might hit a car or pedestrian.
Report on FixMyStreet
